name: The Krakening
description:
use arrow keys  to maneuver your ship, and collect treasure. 

Run away from the kraken. (if it gets you, go to the whirlpool) its fast, but dumb and can be tricked by the islands.

The whirlpool resets the game. 

This was made for the low effort game jam by a family. Toddlers supplied the sound effects. 

Just a warning-  it runs faster in the browser than I anticipated. If you download it, it is bigger and a little easier.
